remarks: Equinumerousity relation for sets of finitely supported functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 7-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mapfien2.s $e |- S = { x e. ( B ^m A ) | x finSupp .0. } $.
mapfien2.t $e |- T = { x e. ( D ^m C ) | x finSupp W } $.
mapfien2.ac $e |- ( ph -> A ~~ C ) $.
mapfien2.bd $e |- ( ph -> B ~~ D ) $.
mapfien2.z $e |- ( ph -> .0. e. B ) $.
mapfien2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. D ) $.
mapfien2 $p |- ( ph -> S ~~ T ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d W x $.
